Measuring Success

You will learn to use the metrics for ascertaining how well you are doing in business and explore the different types of KPI's that helps you understand the performance of your organisation or department. The module is aimed at giving you the skills and tools to measure the success of an organisation.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Critically analyse and evaluate success measures applied by various business enterprises to meet stakeholder expectations. [Knowledge and Understanding, Analysis]

+  Apply a balanced scorecard approach to measure an organisation’s success in non-financial areas. [Application, Problem Solving]

+  Apply data analysis techniques to measure organisations’ financial performance. [Problem Solving, Analysis]
